access: Members of the Firebrands at the rank of second mark or higher have access to this feat.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Quick Spring](/Feats.aspx?ID=4151) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 81</row>

**Archetype** [Acrobat](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=45)

**Prerequisites**
[Acrobat Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1873)

**Access**
Members of the Firebrands at the rank of second mark or higher have access to this feat.

</column>

---

Ishii Bunji is a skilled tumbler, and learning his technique allows you to propel yourself across the battlefield faster than your enemies can react. When you [Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=29), you Stride up to twice your Speed.
name: Quick Spring
